attributes.action: Disinfect all streets and buildings to reduce the spread of Covid-19
attributes.background: Covid-19 is spreading really fast in UK, lockdown might help but Italy, China and Other countries started to disinfect streets and buildings while streets are empty, If UK streets would be disinfected it could reduce the spread of the Virus.

rejection.details:
Ensuring that public spaces are clean and safe is a matter for individual local authorities, and private property is a matter for the owners or tenants of that property, not the Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
